full_summary:
# W7006-22RO99 Technical Services for Dash Instruments and Components
### Request for Standing Offer

#### Tender Details

* **Notice Title (English)**: Request for Standing Offer - Technical Services for Dash Instruments and Components
* **Notice Title (French)**: Demande d’offre à commandes - Services techniques pour les composants et les instruments de tableau de bord
* **Reference Number**: WS3831508163
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Region of Delivery**: Winnipeg
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Participating Countries and Agreements
* **Language of Service**: English
* **Notice Date**: February 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 19, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024

#### Submission Requirements

For the Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Technical Services for Dash Instruments and Components, bidders must submit their proposal documents and bid by April 19, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Please note that bids submitted after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

#### Basis of Payment

The Department of National Defence has defined line items identified in the Annex. The provided basis of payment is detailed in the table below and will be adhered to throughout the duration of the contract.

For the initial two-year period of the contract, bidders will be required to provide services on an as-and-when-requested basis.

#### Contact Information

For additional information and inquiries, please contact Willy Zumbado Diaz at the following:

* Email: [willy.zumbadoaidiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbaudiozadiaztipsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15552499?extsite=MTU1NTI0OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: Please disregard the amendment
